text: hi I'm Kosik Paran CTO at sakti sakr is
into digital advertising so we cater all
types of markets from the smaller guys
to the Enterprise guys and uh to to the
shops as well the challenges faced here
are mainly related to Big Data you need
to collect a lot of data and you also
want to have quick turnaround times
there are always newer features coming
up and you want to reduce time to Market
so we didn't want to uh spend too much
effort on the infrastructure cost of
ownership of the of the instances that
we have is one of the things that we
consider uh we are very frugal by Nature
so we we want to keep our costs very low
and still we want to have very faster
time to Market to cater to these kind of
challenges that we have the big data the
analytics that we would want to do uh we
use Amazon's red shift as our data
warehouse red shift is one we strongly
vouch for we use uh EMR for doing doing
our modeling the analytics jobs uh we
use sqs the the queuing solution that
Amazon has we use S3 for storage so our
default storage is S3 we need to save a
lot of data all the backups all the
logging all of it goes through S3 uh
then it is backed up to Glacier Glacier
is another uh solution that Amazon has
which is very lowc cost solution you may
have uh lesser query performance there
but it's a very lowc cost solution
anything that you would want to back up
can go to to Glacier we use Amazon's
Cloud front for for serving our pixels
very effective actively and very
efficiently so those are mainly the
solutions that we use from AWS that
helps us uh lower time to Market so when
we had our data center our data
warehouse on MySQL we had around 20
terab of data but with the kind of
compression that red shift provides it
got reduced to 2 tab also we saved on
the costs so costs were reduced by 35%
the query performance increased we
intend to go 100x of what we have in
terms of data size and next couple of
years so that is the kind of problem
that we intend to solve so from soccery
standpoint we we want to build that we
want to make our one marketing platform
even better by integrating more channels
by collecting more data and AWS is
Central to it AWS keeps coming up with
these newer Technologies and as a
customer to AWS you should always be on
the lookout for the newer things that
they are coming up with so red shift was
a recent launch now they are coming up
with uh Amazon machine learning tools so
should always be on the lookout for
those newer tools that will uh make your
product much better
